input.sentences: we cheered loudly for the marathon running through our city .
we were disappointing at the trash they left behind though .
cousin [female] made it to the top 500 .
by next year we should have an even bigger race .
output.sentences: These dancers were cheering and singing loudly to cheer on those running in the marathon.
It was dissapointing to see all the trash left by the crowds that watched the day's events.
Running is exhilerating, doing it in costume is hard.
I had to give it up for my female cousin, who is a top runner in her category.
The race gets bigger and sillier, with more people dressing up, every year.
